author: captainmidnight
description:
This video is sponsored by Brilliant. To try everything Brilliant has to offer for free for a full 30 days, visit https://brilliant.org/midnight You’ll also get 20% off an annual premium subscription
Mufasa: The Lion King is Disney's attempt to make a prequel to their megahit remake. Does it work? Well, not really. I go over it all here.
Read my comic BINARY SEA on Amazon Kindle: https://a.co/d/9JfoZC0
Music by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)

title: Mufasa is a Failed Experiment
